about_the_game:
Step into the quirky universe of Catniptic! A third-person psychedelic farming-sim set in a cat's dream. Immerse yourself in a catnip coma filled with mystery and wonder, where you'll embark on a quest to grow catnip and reclaim your stolen furniture. Wishlist now and join Cheech on a trip of a lifetime.

Take on the role of a feline protagonist, unlocking a spectrum of ludicrous abilities and powers. As you grow and harvest magical catnip, you'll discover jump boosts, lasers to zap foes, explosive attacks, and the unparalleled skill of walking on two legs. Unravel each dream's distinct theme, each boasting a unique landscape and hidden characteristics, offering varied and intricate paths to navigate. Among these dream worlds lie pots of catnip and friendly cats trading coveted seeds. These seeds and treasured items can be yours for the right price in coins earned from vanquishing mice. Traverse treacherous platforms, maintain an evergrowing catnip farm, and unravel the secrets that lie within each character's story and endings.

  • 100+ items, including tons of unlocks
  • Grow, harvest, and consume catnip
  • Walk on two legs!
  • RPG leveling system and questing
  • 6 playable characters + 3 secret characters
  • Drive a car!
  • 3D psychedelic platforming
  • You never play the same game twice
  • Dynamic lighting, levels, and art direction
  • Original soundtrack and voice-acting
  • 25+ dreams to explore
  • New game+
  • Tons of trippy visual effects
  • Collect furniture to deck out your cat house.
  • A bunch of achievements
  • Multiple endings
  • Unlockable items, enemies, dreams, bosses, and more
